game.title: Etherian
game.release-date:
Early Access: 26 May, 2018
Full Release: Early Summer 2018
game.description:
Navigate through an ancient course spanning the floating land of Etherian.
Etherian is an adventure-platforming game with puzzle solving elements where you will have to jump, swing, swim, slide, and climb your way through 4 unique biomes. Take your time and find secret items as you explore your environment, or master your skills and speedrun your way through!
game.history: The first full-release project of a couple that met while making games in university and never stopped, Etherian was started in winter 2016 with the goal of creating a game that really used the strengths of the platform to create an engaging gameplay experience specifically for VR.

features.feature: Wide range of unique mechanics and movement systems
Explorable environments with secrets and shortcuts to be found
Play at your own pace - master the course, or enjoy the scenery
Hours of content: 20 full levels, unlockables, and more to be announced in full release
